data.name: GetOrderbyShowroom
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and ShowroomId = @showroomId

data.name: GetOrderbyShowroomandVehicle
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and ShowroomId = @showroomId and VehicleId = @vehicleId

data.name: GetOrderbyCustomer
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and CustomerId = @customerId

data.name: GetOrderbyId
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and OrderId = @orderId

data.name: GetOrderbyShowroomCustomer
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and ShowroomId = @showroomId and CustomerId = @customerId

data.name: InsertOrder
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] (CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate, CreatedDate) values (@customerId, @vehicleId, @showroomId, @orderStatusId, @finalPrice, @hasLoan, @deliveryDate, @createdDate)

data.name: UpdateOrder
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[vehicle].[TestDrive] set OrderStatusId = @orderStatusId, FinalPrice = @finalPrice, DeliveryDate = @deliveryDate, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where OrderId = @orderId
